short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays a new motivational quote every time you open a new Chrome browser tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, stay motivated throughout the day to do your best work. Every time you open a new web browser tab, New Tab, New Quote will display a new, aesthetically-pleasing motivational quote.
